Articles.Content: My first mun orbit was a accident with a satellite. I got into orbit and expected it not to go to the mun. It ended up being able to get to the mun.

Welcome to the community 30Muns

Congrats on reaching the Mun!
That's awesome! Even NASA makes mistakes, glad this one turned out in your favor. Welcome to the Forums and enjoy your stay.
Welcome aboard! That's pretty impressive for an accident.

Welcome to the forums! That's kinda lucky and awesome to be accidentally get to the Mun. o.o

Happy launchings!

Welcome aboard!

We have a few seats open, and plenty on snacks!

(Escape pods are broken, though. Sorry about that.)
